/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/HelloPangolinOffscreen.dir/main.cpp.o  -o HelloPangolinOffscreen -Wl,-rpath,/home/user/hello_cmake/thirdparty/pangolin/build ../../libpango_display.so ../../libpango_windowing.so ../../libpango_opengl.so ../../libpango_image.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so ../../libpango_vars.so ../../libpango_core.so -lrt -lpthread
